embed.title: System logs
embed.description: Depending on the system settings, system logs may contain different levels of information detail. This allows administrators to customize the level of log detail in accordance with security and audit requirements.

delete_message.title: Deleting a message
delete_message.description: The log contains information about all deleted messages in the system. It helps you keep track of who deleted a message and when, and provides transparency about deleted data.

edit_message.title: Editing a message
edit_message.description: The log contains information about all messages that were changed after sending. It provides the ability to view the history of changes to messages, which is useful for monitoring the integrity of communication.

punishment.title: Violation of the rules and punishment
punishment.description: The log includes information about the penalties applied in response to violations of the rules. It helps to maintain order and discipline in the system, ensuring fairness and consistency in the application of disciplinary measures.

economy.title: Transaction or changes in the economy
economy.description: The log reflects all transactions and changes in the economy of the system. It provides information about all financial transactions that have occurred in the system and helps to track cash flows and changes in the economic situation.

ideas.title: Suggestion or idea
ideas.description: The log contains information about all the proposed ideas and proposals that were considered in the system. It helps to track the process of developing ideas and making decisions based on suggestions from participants.

embed.title: System logs
embed.description: Depending on the system settings, system logs may contain different levels of information detail. This allows administrators to customize the level of log detail in accordance with security and audit requirements.

delete_message.title: Deleting a message
delete_message.description: The log contains information about all deleted messages in the system. It helps you keep track of who deleted a message and when, and provides transparency about deleted data.

edit_message.title: Editing a message
edit_message.description: The log contains information about all messages that were changed after sending. It provides the ability to view the history of changes to messages, which is useful for monitoring the integrity of communication.

punishment.title: Violation of the rules and punishment
punishment.description: The log includes information about the penalties applied in response to violations of the rules. It helps to maintain order and discipline in the system, ensuring fairness and consistency in the application of disciplinary measures.

economy.title: Transaction or changes in the economy
economy.description: The log reflects all transactions and changes in the economy of the system. It provides information about all financial transactions that have occurred in the system and helps to track cash flows and changes in the economic situation.

ideas.title: Suggestion or idea
ideas.description: The log contains information about all the proposed ideas and proposals that were considered in the system. It helps to track the process of developing ideas and making decisions based on suggestions from participants.

embed.title: System logs
embed.description: Depending on the system settings, system logs may contain different levels of information detail. This allows administrators to customize the level of log detail in accordance with security and audit requirements.

delete_message.title: Deleting a message
delete_message.description: The log contains information about all deleted messages in the system. It helps you keep track of who deleted a message and when, and provides transparency about deleted data.

edit_message.title: Editing a message
edit_message.description: The log contains information about all messages that were changed after sending. It provides the ability to view the history of changes to messages, which is useful for monitoring the integrity of communication.

punishment.title: Violation of the rules and punishment
punishment.description: The log includes information about the penalties applied in response to violations of the rules. It helps to maintain order and discipline in the system, ensuring fairness and consistency in the application of disciplinary measures.

economy.title: Transaction or changes in the economy
economy.description: The log reflects all transactions and changes in the economy of the system. It provides information about all financial transactions that have occurred in the system and helps to track cash flows and changes in the economic situation.

ideas.title: Suggestion or idea
ideas.description: The log contains information about all the proposed ideas and proposals that were considered in the system. It helps to track the process of developing ideas and making decisions based on suggestions from participants.

embed.title: Registros del sistema
embed.description: Dependiendo de la configuración del sistema, los registros del sistema pueden contener diferentes niveles de información detallada. Esto permite a los administradores personalizar el nivel de detalle del registro de acuerdo con los requisitos de seguridad y auditoría.

delete_message.title: Eliminar un mensaje
delete_message.description: El registro contiene información sobre todos los mensajes borrados en el sistema. Le ayuda a mantener el seguimiento de quién eliminó un mensaje y cuándo, y proporciona transparencia sobre los datos borrados.

edit_message.title: Editar un mensaje
edit_message.description: El registro contiene información sobre todos los mensajes que fueron modificados después de enviar. Proporciona la capacidad de ver el historial de cambios en los mensajes, lo que es útil para supervisar la integridad de la comunicación.

punishment.title: Violación de las reglas y castigo
punishment.description: El registro incluye información sobre las sanciones aplicadas en respuesta a las violaciones de las normas. Ayuda a mantener el orden y la disciplina en el sistema, garantizando la equidad y la coherencia en la aplicación de las medidas disciplinarias.

economy.title: Transacción o cambios en la economía
economy.description: El registro refleja todas las transacciones y cambios en la economía del sistema. Proporciona información sobre todas las transacciones financieras que han tenido lugar en el sistema y ayuda a rastrear los flujos de efectivo y los cambios en la situación económica.

ideas.title: Sugirió una idea
ideas.description: El registro contiene información sobre todas las ideas y propuestas propuestas que fueron consideradas en el sistema. Ayuda a rastrear el proceso de desarrollo de ideas y toma de decisiones basadas en sugerencias de los participantes.

embed.title: System logs
embed.description: Depending on the system settings, system logs may contain different levels of information detail. This allows administrators to customize the level of log detail in accordance with security and audit requirements.

delete_message.title: Deleting a message
delete_message.description: The log contains information about all deleted messages in the system. It helps you keep track of who deleted a message and when, and provides transparency about deleted data.

edit_message.title: Editing a message
edit_message.description: The log contains information about all messages that were changed after sending. It provides the ability to view the history of changes to messages, which is useful for monitoring the integrity of communication.

punishment.title: Violation of the rules and punishment

embed.title: Системные логи
embed.description: В зависимости от системных настроек, системные журналы могут содержать различные уровни детальной информации. Это позволяет администраторам настраивать уровень детализации журнала в соответствии с требованиями безопасности и аудита.

delete_message.title: Удаление сообщения
delete_message.description: Лог содержит информацию о всех удаленных сообщениях в системе. Он помогает отслеживать, кто и когда удалил сообщение, и обеспечивает прозрачность в отношении удаленных данных.

edit_message.title: Редактирование сообщения
edit_message.description: Лог содержит информацию о всех сообщениях, которые были изменены после отправки. Он предоставляет возможность просмотра истории изменений сообщений, что полезно для контроля целостности коммуникации.

punishment.title: Нарушение правил и наказание
punishment.description: Лог включает информацию о примененных наказаниях в ответ на нарушения правил. Он помогает поддерживать порядок и дисциплину в системе, обеспечивая справедливость и последовательность в применении мер дисциплинарного воздействия.

economy.title: Транзакция или изменения в экономике
economy.description: Лог отражает все транзакции и изменения в экономике системы. Он предоставляет информацию о всех финансовых операциях, произошедших в системе, и помогает отслеживать денежные потоки и изменения в экономической ситуации.

ideas.title: Предложение или идея
ideas.description: Лог содержит информацию о всех предложенных идеях и предложениях, которые были рассмотрены в системе. Он помогает отслеживать процесс развития идей и принятия решений на основе предложений от участников.

init.title: Идея
init.description: Модуль идей позволяет собирать, обсуждать и оценивать пользовательские предложения. Она организует идеи в одном месте, позволяет голосовать за них и отслеживать их статус.

init.title: Временные приватные каналы
init.description:
Временные каналы создаются автоматически при входе в канал триггера и удаляются при выходе из созданного канала.
Пользователь, который создал канал, управляет им, включая изменение настроек и применение мута в сторону пользователя в этом канале.

logs.channel: Select the channel to which the logs will be sent
logs.set-channel: Select the channel you want to change

embed.title: System logs
embed.description: Depending on the system settings, system logs may contain different levels of information detail. This allows administrators to customize the level of log detail in accordance with security and audit requirements.

delete_message.title: Deleting a message
delete_message.description: The log contains information about all deleted messages in the system. It helps you keep track of who deleted a message and when, and provides transparency about deleted data.

edit_message.title: Editing a message
edit_message.description: The log contains information about all messages that were changed after sending. It provides the ability to view the history of changes to messages, which is useful for monitoring the integrity of communication.

punishment.title: Violation of the rules and punishment
punishment.description: The log includes information about the penalties applied in response to violations of the rules. It helps to maintain order and discipline in the system, ensuring fairness and consistency in the application of disciplinary measures.

economy.title: Transaction or changes in the economy
economy.description: The log reflects all transactions and changes in the economy of the system. It provides information about all financial transactions that have occurred in the system and helps to track cash flows and changes in the economic situation.

ideas.title: Suggestion or idea
ideas.description: The log contains information about all the proposed ideas and proposals that were considered in the system. It helps to track the process of developing ideas and making decisions based on suggestions from participants.
